# Author: LRP
# Date: 24-07-2015
# logg-Teff clipping rather than straight logg cuts
# lower limit on logg has 0.3 dex subtracted (Chiavassa et al. 2011)
# Weighted average from the best 100 models weights = exp(chi-squared/2.)
# reduced chi-sqaured (normalised by number of lines also)
# Errors calculated from all models with chi**2_min + 3
# NGC6822 spectra
# Output parameters using only the 8 diag. lines
# RSG1 RSG2 RSG4 RSG7 RSG8 RSG9 RSG10 RSG11 RSG14 RSG17 RSG18
